page.title: 04RIBSTON ESTATE(RIBSTON PARK)
page.content: {Ribston Park}is very big and there are lots of farms that are let, and cattle,sheep and horses graze.The other farmers pay to rent the land. There are lots of woods,the biggest one has deer in.There are three pens in that wood.There are quite a lot of{ Christmas trees. There are dikes and some have trout and eels in them.The { {Park} is a part of the{estate, pheasants are reared and shot in September.There are some partridge but not many,but a lot die when they are chicks.There are rabbits and hares and lots of other wild animals and birds. The{Dent}family own the{estate,}they have done for a hundred years.They are very interested in conservation. The estate has an area of{4,000}acres, almost all of this area is part of it. The{Dents}built the{church}and{school soon after they moved to {Ribston.
